name: ARER
description:
Play as a silly little robot named A.R.E.R. and try to save the town from the tyranny of the evil wizard Mick McWhiz! Collect powers scattered around the map and use the mouse buttons to control them. Careful, you can only hold two abilities at once, and if you get hit or fall in the spikes, you will lose them!
Use oil to fix engines, a magnet to pull boxes to you, a tesla coil to charge batteries, and a parasol to glide.

Controls:
A and D or left arrow and right arrow to move
Space to jump
Right and left mouse click when near a powerup to assign it to that slot
HOLD right and left mouse click to use the power assigned to that slot
